name: autoscaler
description:
DC/OS Autoscaler. 

 This autoscaler allow you to scaler your cluster hosted in any cloud provider.
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS package is currently in preview, Please click on 'Advanced Installation' to configure it.
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Autoscaler is being installed!
